data.prayer: Spirit, encourage the church of Nellore, Andhra Pradesh, India that they are blessed with every heavenly blessing.
data.verse: Blessed be the God and Father of our Lord Jesus Christ, who has blessed us with every spiritual blessing in the heavenly places in Christ

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Nellore, Andhra Pradesh, India
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Father, encourage the 32,600 believers in Nellore to not just be consumers of knowledge but be producers of love, mercy, kindness, and justice.
data.verse: let us not love with words or speech but with actions and in truth.

data.section_summary: On average, 2 people will die without Jesus in the next hour in Nellore, Andhra Pradesh, India.
data.prayer: Jesus, send your gospel to these.
Spirit, teach the 32,600 believers that their old life is dead and their new life is hid with Christ.
data.verse: For you died, and your life is hidden with Christ in God.

data.prayer: Father, please send new teachers into the harvest, who can correct the lies of our enemy in the county of Nellore, Andhra Pradesh, India.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.prayer: Lord, you sent Jesus as a witness to testify about the light so that all the Malla Jetti people might believe through him.
Spirit, help the people of the the county of Nellore to be consumed with longing for your Word at all times, like David.
data.verse: My soul is consumed with longing for your laws at all times.

data.prayer: Father, help media producers communicate the gospel in a way that is understandable to the people of Nellore, Andhra Pradesh, India.
data.verse: But from there, you will seek the LORD your God, and you will find Him if you search for Him with all your heart and all your soul.

data.prayer: Jesus, please help the 32,600 believers in the county of Nellore to be filled with joyful obedience at all times, as you modeled for us all.

location.name: Nellore
location.people_groups_list: Nethagiri, Bania Irupathi Nalu Manai Chetti, Vanniyan, Maniyattikkaran, Yatagiri
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Nethagiri (600), Bania Irupathi Nalu Manai Chetti (34,000), Vanniyan (12,735,000), Maniyattikkaran (5,000), Yatagiri (200)
